description:
The 2011 video game Minecraft became a worldwide phenomenon that has since spawned spin-offs, merchandise, and toys. Naturally, a Minecraft movie was eventually announced, and now the first official trailer for the film has been released online. Interestingly, the film – which is titled A Minecraft Movie – takes a live-action approach to the source [...]

The post ‘A Minecraft Movie’ Trailer Includes Jack Black And Jason Momoa In Live-Action appeared first on ScreenGeek.
title: ‘A Minecraft Movie’ Trailer Includes Jack Black And Jason Momoa In Live-Action
